data.text: @CraigCaplan @WadeMiller_USMC I'd rather see the government shut down than see a vote on this Omnibus bill no one has even read.
@CraigCaplan Answer to 30 trillion deficit- spend trillion more. Suffer the next generation.

2 House Democrats voted No against the rule for $1.5T omnibus spending package funding gov't through Sept. 30th with Ukraine aid included as well as the Russia oil ban, $15.6B COVID-19 relief & 4-day gov't funding bills:
Bush-MO
Tlaib-MI
https://t.co/k2Y0o3njCb
